                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Returns an image from the BMP file provided, or null if the file does not appear to be a valid BMP image.
        Parameters:
        bmpFile - a BMP file.
        Returns:
        the image, or null if this was not a valid image.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs.

      • readImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage readImage(java.io.File bmpFile,
                                                     java.awt.image.BufferedImage dst)
                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Returns an image from the BMP file provided, or null if the file does not appear to be a valid BMP image.
        Parameters:
        bmpFile - a BMP file.
        dst - a destination to store the image in. If this is non-null it must be the correct size to contain all of the image data.
        Returns:
        the image, or null if this was not a valid image.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs.

      • readImage

                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Returns an image from the BMP data provided, or null if the input stream does not appear to be a valid BMP image.
        Parameters:
        in - BMP image data.
        Returns:
        the image, or null if this was not a valid image.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs.

                                                     java.awt.image.BufferedImage dst)
                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Returns an image from the BMP data provided, or null if the input stream does not appear to be a valid BMP image.
        Parameters:
        in - BMP image data.
        dst - a destination to store the image in. If this is non-null it must be the correct size to contain all of the image data.
        Returns:
        the image, or null if this was not a valid image.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs.

      • getSize

        public static java.awt.Dimension getSize(java.io.File file)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the dimensions of a BMP.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to retrieve the size of.
        Returns:
        the size of the BMP, or null if the file does not appear to be a valid BMP image.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs.

      • getSize

        public static java.awt.Dimension getSize(java.io.InputStream in)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the dimensions of a BMP.
        Parameters:
        in - a stream containing a BMP. This will be closed when this method returns.
        Returns:
        the size of the BMP, or null if this input stream did not appear to be a valid BMP image.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs.

      • createThumbnail

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage createThumbnail(java.io.File bmpFile,
                                                           java.awt.Dimension maxSize)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Create a thumbnail of a BMP file.
        Parameters:
        bmpFile - a BMP file.
        maxSize - the maximum width and height of the thumbnail. If the image normally exceeds one (or both) of these dimensions, then the image data will be scaled down.

        If the BMP image is smaller than maxSize it is not scaled up. This argument is only used to scale down.

        Returns:
        a thumbnail of a BMP file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs.

      • createThumbnail

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage createThumbnail(java.net.URL bmpURL,
                                                           java.awt.Dimension maxSize)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Create a thumbnail of a BMP file.
        Parameters:
        bmpURL - a BMP file.
        maxSize - the maximum width and height of the thumbnail. If the image normally exceeds one (or both) of these dimensions, then the image data will be scaled down.

        If the BMP image is smaller than maxSize it is not scaled up. This argument is only used to scale down.

        Returns:
        a thumbnail of a BMP file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs.

      • createThumbnail

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage createThumbnail(java.io.InputStream bmp,
                                                           java.awt.Dimension maxSize)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Create a thumbnail of a BMP image.
        Parameters:
        bmp - a BMP image.
        maxSize - the maximum width and height of the thumbnail. If the image normally exceeds one (or both) of these dimensions, then the image data will be scaled down.

        If the BMP image is smaller than maxSize it is not scaled up. This argument is only used to scale down.

        Returns:
        a thumbnail of a BMP image.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs.

      • createThumbnail

        public static void createThumbnail(java.io.File bmpFile,
                                   java.awt.image.BufferedImage dest)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Create a thumbnail of a BMP file.
        Parameters:
        bmpFile - a BMP file.
        dest - an image to store the thumbnail in. This must the size of the original image or smaller: it may not be larger.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs.

      • createThumbnail

        public static void createThumbnail(java.io.InputStream bmp,
                                   java.awt.image.BufferedImage dest)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Create a thumbnail of a BMP image.
        Parameters:
        bmp - a BMP image.
        dest - an image to store the thumbnail in.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs.
